title: Bureaucratic crime
author: VD
content_html:
In the latest blow against the agency, court documents show a State Department employee provided personal information from passport applications for use in a credit-card fraud scheme.

As Instapundit notes, just wait until they get your hands on your medical records….
content_text:
In the latest blow against the agency, court documents show a State Department employee provided personal information from passport applications
for use in a credit-card fraud scheme
.
